txt.en: Beasts can be found at Helva's Edge in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should hunt wild game at Helva's Edge.
The hill of Helva's Edge is a good place to hunt wild game within the Wildwood.
Hunt wild game at Helva's Edge
Beasts can be found at Helva's Edge in the Wildwood.\n\nYou should hunt wild game at Helva's Edge.
The hill of Helva's Edge is a good place to hunt wild game within the Wildwood. Hunting here will earn you respect with the Free Peoples who also hunt in the wilds.
